reviews.review_msg: She is the harderst marker Ive ever gotten. Her way, or you fail. Even in a subjective course like English. Would highly not recommend
easier than eng12 but very helpful as well
Cathi is super duper helpful. She is always fun and excited when she is teaching. I loved all of her classes. Take a class with her!
Best prof i've ever had! If you can take a class with her, do it!
Runs a constructivist classroom, which can be frustrating but she is helpful and knowledgeable about her class materials.  Gives practical assignments and marks fairly if not easily.
Great prof. Really cute when she gets excited about the material.

there should be 2 chilis next to her name..HOT! hehehe seriously, cathi's not only a great prof but a great person too. super helpful and understanding. take her class, you wont regret it!plus, she doesnt believe in tests!
really good prof, makes 2 hours seem like 20 minutes. cool, hip and "young-ish".
Is currently complaining about not being on this website... How cool is that? Seriously though, great prof!
